New Bribes.name: New Bribes
New Bribes.bonus: Mr. Pigibank is up to no good once again, and he's looking to get some funding from his favorite patron... you. Well, your wallet specifically.

Science Paintbrush.name: Science Paintbrush
Science Paintbrush.bonus: Adds a new bonus type to your crop scientist's Data Sheet! Specifically '+0.1 Base Critter caught in Trapping' per Crop!

Laboratory Bling.name: Laboratory Bling
Laboratory Bling.bonus: Adds 3 new Jewels to unlock at the Jewel Spinner in W4 Town. Or, get one for free every 700 total Lab LV as shown in Rift Skill Mastery.

True Godly Blessings.name: True Godly Blessings
True Godly Blessings.bonus: All Divinity Gods give 1.05x higher Blessing bonus per God Rank. Whats a Blessing bonus? Select a god, it's the one on the bottom, go look.

The Endercaptain.name: The Endercaptain
The Endercaptain.bonus: Adds the Endercaptain to Recruitment pool. They're very rare, and have a hidden account-wide +25% Loot Multi and Artifact Find.

New Critter.name: New Critter
New Critter.bonus: Unlocks a new critter type to capture! These have their own very special vial in Alchemy.

Brighter Lighthouse Bulb.name: Brighter Lighthouse Bulb
Brighter Lighthouse Bulb.bonus: You can now find 3 additional Artifacts from The Edge island.

Ionized Sigils.name: Ionized Sigils
Ionized Sigils.bonus: Sigils can now be upgraded a 3rd time. Push past lame ol' yellow, and further increasing those sigil boosts!

bonus: You can now find Sovereign Artifacts from sailing, but only if you've found the Eldritch form first.
Certain monsters in World 6 will now have a rare chance to drop Ninja Hats, but only the hats that your Ninja Twins have equipped.
Certain monsters in World 6 will now have a rare chance to drop Ninja Hats, but only the ones you've found already from the Ninja Castle!
